# Freeplay Onboarding Skills - Resource Index

> Freeplay is the ops platform for enterprise AI engineering teams providing integrated workflow for LLM observability, prompt management, evaluations, testing, and human review.

## Freeplay Documentation (External)

Full documentation index: https://docs.freeplay.ai/llms.txt

### Getting Started
- Quick Start Overview: https://docs.freeplay.ai/docs/quick-start-overview
- Integrate with Your Application: https://docs.freeplay.ai/docs/integrate-with-your-application
- Project Setup: https://docs.freeplay.ai/docs/project-setup

### Observability (Sessions, Traces, Completions)
- Sessions, Traces, and Completions: https://docs.freeplay.ai/docs/sessions-traces-and-completions
- Common Integration Patterns: https://docs.freeplay.ai/docs/common-integration-patterns
- Building Agents: https://docs.freeplay.ai/docs/building-agents
- Multi-Turn Chat: https://docs.freeplay.ai/docs/multi-turn-chat
- Tool Calls: https://docs.freeplay.ai/docs/tool-calls
- Streaming Responses: https://docs.freeplay.ai/docs/streaming-responses

### Prompt Management
- Prompt Management: https://docs.freeplay.ai/docs/prompt-management
- Advanced Templating (Mustache): https://docs.freeplay.ai/docs/advanced-templating
- Structured Outputs: https://docs.freeplay.ai/docs/structured-outputs
- Structured Outputs (OpenAI): https://docs.freeplay.ai/docs/structured-outputs-openai
- Environments: https://docs.freeplay.ai/docs/environments
- Prompt Bundling: https://docs.freeplay.ai/docs/prompt-bundling

### SDKs & Integrations
- SDKs Overview: https://docs.freeplay.ai/docs/sdks-overview
- Python SDK Setup: https://docs.freeplay.ai/reference/sdk-setup
- SDK Organizing Principles: https://docs.freeplay.ai/reference/organizing-principles
- Sessions (SDK): https://docs.freeplay.ai/reference/sessions
- Traces (SDK): https://docs.freeplay.ai/reference/traces
- Recording Completions (SDK): https://docs.freeplay.ai/reference/recording-completions
- Customer Feedback (SDK): https://docs.freeplay.ai/reference/customer-feedback
- Prompts (SDK): https://docs.freeplay.ai/reference/prompts
- Data Models (SDK): https://docs.freeplay.ai/reference/data-models

### Framework Integrations
- LangGraph: https://docs.freeplay.ai/docs/langgraph
- Vercel AI SDK: https://docs.freeplay.ai/docs/vercel-ai-sdk
- Google ADK: https://docs.freeplay.ai/docs/google-adk
- OpenTelemetry: https://docs.freeplay.ai/docs/opentelemetry

### Code Recipes (Runnable Examples)
- Single Prompt: https://docs.freeplay.ai/docs/single-prompt
- Multi Prompt Chain: https://docs.freeplay.ai/docs/multi-prompt-chain
- Record Agent Traces: https://docs.freeplay.ai/docs/record-agent-traces
- Managing Multi-Turn Chat History: https://docs.freeplay.ai/docs/managing-multi-turn-chat-history
- OpenAI Function Calls: https://docs.freeplay.ai/docs/openai-function-calls
- Anthropic Tools: https://docs.freeplay.ai/docs/anthropic-tools

### Evaluations & Testing
- Evaluations Overview: https://docs.freeplay.ai/docs/evaluations-overview
- Test Runs Overview: https://docs.freeplay.ai/docs/test-runs-overview
- Datasets: https://docs.freeplay.ai/docs/datasets

### Open Source SDKs
- Python SDK (GitHub): https://github.com/freeplay-ai/freeplay-python-sdk
- Node SDK (GitHub): https://github.com/freeplay-ai/freeplay-node-sdk

## Internal Skill References

### Shared Resources (Always Available)
- Prompt Mapping Guide: _shared/prompt-mapping-guide.md

### Codebase Analysis (freeplay-plan)
- Framework Detection: freeplay-plan/_reference/framework-detection.md
- Prompt Classification: freeplay-plan/_reference/prompt-classification-guide.md

### Prompt Migration (prompt-migration)
- Variable Conversion: prompt-migration/_reference/convert-to-mustache.md

### Logging Integration (record-to-freeplay)
- General Logging Guide: record-to-freeplay/_reference/general-logging-guide.md
- Freeplay Patterns: record-to-freeplay/_reference/patterns/freeplay-patterns.md

- Vercel AI SDK: record-to-freeplay/_reference/integrations/vercel-integration.md
